quote.msg: 我連咩都會間唔中斷線要重連
Down surfshark Profile去OpenVpn，取代surfshark app會解決到
請問點樣可以dl sufshark profile？謝謝

replies.msg:
去 surfshark website login 返
跟住 去 "設備" 個 page , 碌到最底 有 "進階" , 中間 "手動設定"
裏面就有唔同位置 server 嘅 config download
而最下面就有 專用嘅 username & password

quote.msg: 上官網，manually add config ，dl 個OpenVPN GUI add 入去，打返username pwd ，啱啱搞完

quote.msg: Down surfshark Profile去OpenVpn，取代surfshark app會解決到
請問點樣可以dl sufshark profile？謝謝

去 surfshark website login 返
跟住 去 "設備" 個 page , 碌到最底 有 "進階" , 中間 "手動設定"
裏面就有唔同位置 server 嘅 config download
而最下面就有 專用嘅 username & password

replies.msg: 嘩正 上網速度快過用佢個app

quote.msg: 請問點樣可以dl sufshark profile？謝謝

去 surfshark website login 返
跟住 去 "設備" 個 page , 碌到最底 有 "進階" , 中間 "手動設定"
裏面就有唔同位置 server 嘅 config download
而最下面就有 專用嘅 username & password

Connect to any servers in countries other than the United Kingdom, Japan, India, Italy, Germany, Korea, Norway, Australia or Poland to dive into Netflix US content.
